WWUS76 KSTO 291150
NPWSTO

URGENT - WEATHER MESSAGE
NATIONAL WEATHER SERVICE SACRAMENTO CA
350 AM PST MON DEC 29 2014

CAZ015>019-064-300000-
/O.NEW.KSTO.WI.Y.0015.141230T1400Z-141231T2000Z/
NORTHERN SACRAMENTO VALLEY-CENTRAL SACRAMENTO VALLEY-
SOUTHERN SACRAMENTO VALLEY-CARQUINEZ STRAIT AND DELTA-
NORTHERN SAN JOAQUIN VALLEY-CLEAR LAKE/SOUTHERN LAKE COUNTY-
INCLUDING THE CITIES OF...REDDING...CHICO...SACRAMENTO...
STOCKTON...MODESTO...LAKEPORT
350 AM PST MON DEC 29 2014

...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TUESDAY TO NOON PST
WEDNESDAY...

THE NATIONAL WEATHER SERVICE IN SACRAMENTO HAS ISSUED A WIND
ADVISORY FOR THE SACRAMENTO VALLEY...DELTA...NORTHERN SAN JOAQUIN
VALLEY AND SOUTHERN LAKE COUNTY...WHICH IS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM
TUESDAY TO NOON PST WEDNESDAY.

* WINDS: NORTH 15 TO 25 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 45 MPH.

* TIMING: TUESDAY INTO MIDDAY WEDNESDAY.

* LOCATIONS INCLUDE: STOCKTON...MODESTO...SACRAMENTO...CHICO... 
  REDDING...LAKEPORT.

* IMPACTS: DIFFICULT DRIVING CONDITIONS...POSSIBLE TREE DAMAGE AND
  POWER OUTAGES.

* FOR A DETAILED VIEW OF THE HAZARD AREA...VISIT 
  HTTP://WWW.WEATHER.GOV/SACRAMENTO/HAZARDS

PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS...

A WIND ADVISORY MEANS THAT WINDS OF 40 MPH ARE EXPECTED. WINDS
THIS STRONG CAN MAKE DRIVING DIFFICULT...ESPECIALLY FOR HIGH
PROFILE VEHICLES. USE EXTRA CAUTION.

&&

INTERACT WITH US VIA SOCIAL MEDIA
WWW.FACEBOOK.COM/NWS.SACRAMENTO
WWW.TWITTER.COM/NWSSACRAMENTO

$$

CAZ068-069-300000-
/O.NEW.KSTO.WI.Y.0015.141231T0000Z-150101T0000Z/
WESTERN PLUMAS COUNTY/LASSEN PARK-
WEST SLOPE NORTHERN SIERRA NEVADA-
INCLUDING THE CITIES OF...CHESTER...QUINCY...BLUE CANYON
350 AM PST MON DEC 29 2014

...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM TUESDAY TO 4 PM PST
WEDNESDAY...

THE NATIONAL WEATHER SERVICE IN SACRAMENTO HAS ISSUED A WIND
ADVISORY FOR WESTERN PLUMAS COUNTY AND THE WEST SLOPES OF THE
NORTHERN SIERRA NEVADA...WHICH IS IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM TUESDAY TO
4 PM PST WEDNESDAY.

* WINDS: NORTHEAST 20 TO 30 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 55 MPH. LOCAL
  GUSTS TO 90 MPH OR HIGHER ACROSS THE NORTHERN SIERRA CREST.

* TIMING: LATE TUESDAY TO LATE WEDNESDAY.

* LOCATIONS INCLUDE: CHESTER...QUINCY...BLUE CANYON.

* IMPACTS: DIFFICULT DRIVING CONDITIONS...POSSIBLE TREE DAMAGE AND
  POWER OUTAGES.

* FOR A DETAILED VIEW OF THE HAZARD AREA...VISIT 
  HTTP://WWW.WEATHER.GOV/SACRAMENTO/HAZARDS

PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS...

A WIND ADVISORY MEANS THAT WINDS OF 40 MPH ARE EXPECTED. WINDS
THIS STRONG CAN MAKE DRIVING DIFFICULT...ESPECIALLY FOR HIGH
PROFILE VEHICLES. USE EXTRA CAUTION.

&&

WWW.FACEBOOK.COM/NWS.SACRAMENTO
